oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West Nashville Free Will Baptist Church, 2001 March
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of West Nashville Free Will Baptist Church located at 5600 Pennsylvania Avenue in the West Nashville neighborhood of Nashville, Tennessee. The church was built in 1915 as the United Brethren Church. In the mid 1920s the name changed to Pennsylvania Avenue Baptist Church. By 1938 the current name of West Nashville Free Will Baptist Church was in place. The exterior walls are brick. The roof is made of asphalt shingles. The windows have wood frames. The doors are wood. Special features include a four-sided wood steeple. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Nashville Free Will Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
